review: Great little gadget. Gets your Tv going for Netflix
author: svgrl1981

review: Need more applications compatible with the device.
author: Thomas Geeverghese

review: Works fine. Like it especially for the patio TV.
author: L. Dabalsa "Tech Freak"

review: There is not much to say here it is just a really nice device to share what's on your desktop. There really is no interface and there is no remote. I use it to stream my slingbox to a room that does not have cable. since it works on wifi, there is no clutter of cables or power adapters. I just plug it into the HDMI / USB port on the TV and I am done.
author: Julio Caban

review: I bought it to test it if it works when visit our parents. The veredict: not very practical. Setting it up in a different wifi is too complicated (need a factory reset), had wifi signal problems where other devices worked ok, and the lack of a remote makes an unviable solution to give it to my parents. Nice as a hobby gadget.
author: Jairo Lopez

review: If I have showbox on my phone would my showbox work on chromecast.
author: NoMore

review: works as advertised. Understand that it doesn't mirror everything on the laptop. I didn't realize that. But it does what it says it does, and it's easy to use and set up. Multiple iPhones can connect to it. I never need to reset it. It's cool. Worth the minor investment. If you have Netflix on your phone, you can travel with this tiny thing and use it anywhere. (Hotels, friends house..)
author: Christopher C Thomson
